original_text: Now Hannah, she spake in her heart; only her lips moved, but her voice was not heard: therefore Eli thought she had been drunken.
korean_text: 한나가 속으로 말하매 입술만 움직이고 음성은 들리지 아니하므로 엘리는 그가 취한 줄로 생각한지라

sentences.original_text: Now Hannah, she spake in her heart
but her voice was not heard
therefore Eli thought she had been drunken
